title: Chat problem
body: Why i can t connect to chat ??{{champion:35}}

replies.body: Are you still having issues connecting to the chat service? If so, please let me know and we can work together to resolve it.

There was issue yesterday:
You can keep an eye on server status pages when something abnormal happens:
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune
https://twitter.com/status_lol
